text: Va sazovor nest, ki mu'minon hamagī rahsipor [-i çihod] şavand. Pas, caro az har gurūhe az onon iddae rahsipor nameşavand [va iddae niz hamrohi pajomʙar namemonand], to [ʙa saʙaʙi onci az mahzaraş faro megirand] dar in ogohī ʙijoʙand va qavmi xudro vaqte ʙa sūjaşon ʙozgaştand, ʙim dihand? Boşad, ki onon [az kajfari ilohī ʙitarsand va] ʙiparhezand
